title: Americano: Could Elon Musk save Twitter?
description:
Freddy Gray speaks to Kat Rosenfield, the author and UnHerd columnist, about Elon Musk's proposal to buy a controlling stake in the social media giant.

Rosenfield's latest book, No One Will Miss Her, is published by HarperCollins and is available to buy now.Â
